pr_title: fix: stored procedures are not updatable due to a missing boolean = true

timeline.message:
fix: stored procedures are not updatable due to a missing boolean = true

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

fix: base version history service ignores the current version of the Stored Proc and does not reapply

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText:
wonder if we should add a comment to explaining the why.
basically we just want the procedures to get re-written every time (whether its a newer version or not)?
timeline.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: Right.  I can add a comment
replies.author: prb112

timeline.message:
fix: update the BaseObject with a comment

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>
